tool_description: Custom deal feed for Target online, providing daily updates for coupons, discounts, and special price breaks along with the necessary information, images, tags, and links directly to the products.
title: Target Deals Coupons

api_list.name: Search Target deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to search in Target deals by keywords
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://target-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/target/products_keyword"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "target-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Target deals
api_list.description: Endpoint to get Target weekly deals
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://target-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com/target/deals"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "target-deals-coupons.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
